text: Henry Gabriel Cisneros (born June 11, 1947) is an American politician and businessman. He was the mayor of San Antonio, Texas, from 1981 to 1989. He is a Democrat. He also was the 10th Secretary of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) in the administration of President Bill Clinton from 1993 to 1997. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Housing and Urban Development Category:Mayors of San Antonio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from San Antonio
title: Henry Cisneros
